Name: An fMRI dataset in response to "The Grand Budapest Hotel", a socially-rich, naturalistic movie
Acknowledgements: We thank Terry Sacket and the rest of the DBIC (Dartmouth Brain Imaging Center) personnel for assistance in data collection, and Yaroslav Halchenko for preparing the BIDS dataset.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the corresponding paper Visconti di Oleggio Castello, M., Chauhan, V., Jiahui, G., & Gobbini, M. I. (2020).
